targets.query: SELECT last("build_unavailable_duration") FROM "KYLIN_METRICS_RP"."system_metric" WHERE ("entity" =~ /^$project$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "entity"
SELECT last("jvm_memory_heap_max") FROM "KYLIN_METRICS_RP"."system_metric" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "entity"
SELECT last("sparder_restart_total_times") FROM "KYLIN_METRICS_RP"."system_metric" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host-global$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"
SELECT "model_num_gauge" FROM "KYLIN_METRICS_RP"."system_metric" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "entity"
SELECT last("model_index_num_gauge") FROM "KYLIN_METRICS_RP"."system_metric" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "model"
SELECT last("query_total_times") FROM "KYLIN_METRICS_RP"."system_metric" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host-$project$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "entity", "host"
SELECT last("query_num_per_host") FROM "KYLIN_METRICS_RP"."system_metric" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "entity"

list.definition: show tag values from system_metric with key="entity" where category =~ /project/;
list.name: project
list.query: show tag values from system_metric with key="entity" where category =~ /project/;
